pages.text: In ATFC potion-effects are implemented through the power of $(#F0F)Alcohol!$()$(br2)Automatic potion creation requires the use of both $(thing)Barrels$() and Create machinery, which is why it is recommended to read $(l:patchouli:create_integration/barrel_automation)Barrel Automation$() before designing your setup.$(br2)Alcohols are mixed with powders in order to be turned$(br)   into potions.

$(br)Alcohols come in three strengths:$(br2)$(l)Normal Beverages$() which have no effect,$(br2)$(l)Formulated Beverages$() which provide level 1 potion effects,$(br2)$(l)Alchemical Beverages$() which provide level 2 effects.$(br2)$(br)The recipes to create these fluids can be found in JEI.

$(thing)Spouts$() can be used to automatically fill jugs with beverages.$(br)$(l)Formulated$() and $(l)Alchemical$() beverages can also be spouted into $(thing)Glass Bottles$() in order to create $(thing)Splash Potions$().$(br2)$(l)Formulated Beverages$()$(br)last 4:00 min,$(br)$(l)Formulated Splash Potions$()$(br)last 3:00 min,$(br)$(l)Alchemical Beverages$()$(br)last 2:00 min,$(br)$(l)Alchemical Splash Potions$()$(br)last 1:30 min.
